fields.name: Tenant Name
fields.value: First National Bank and Trust Company

fields.name: Documents
items: Original Lease Agreement dated July 31, 1972
First Amendment to Lease dated September 24, 1973
Second Amendment to Lease dated June 19, 1975
Third Amendment to Lease dated December 23, 1997
Fourth Amendment to Lease dated July 20, 2023
Exhibit A (describing the work to be completed by Lessee)
Insurance Certificates evidencing required insurance coverage
Any necessary permits or licenses for Lessee's operations on the premises

fields.name: Guarantor
fields.value: No explicit guarantor mentioned. Parties: Lessor (RAF SALINA LLC), Lessee (SUNFLOWER BANK, N.A.).

fields.name: Pro Rata Share
fields.value: Not explicitly stated; inferred from tenant’s prorated tax obligations.

fields.name: Options
items: Right to Terminate on 20th and 40th anniversaries with two years' written notice.
Removal of Improvements: allowed with restoration and bond.
Assignment and Subletting: allowed with Lessor’s reasonable consent.
Indemnification: tenant may indemnify Lessor for claims.
Bona Fide Dispute: tenant not in default during valid disputes.
Insurance Requirements: maintain and provide certificates of insurance.
Notice Provisions: tenant has right to receive notices at designated address.

fields.name: Use
fields.value: Banking purposes – operation and maintenance of a bank or drive-in banking facility.

fields.name: Exclusive Use
fields.value: Tenant has exclusive rights for certain businesses; landlord cannot lease to competing automotive or banking businesses.

fields.name: Percentage Rent
fields.value: Not explicitly mentioned; may apply if retail sales exceed 62.5× annual rent for two consecutive years.

fields.name: Gross Sales
fields.value: Not explicitly stated; relates to retail sales exceeding 62.5× annual rent threshold.

fields.name: Financial Statements
fields.value: Not specified; tenant must maintain insurance and pay rent/taxes as per lease.

fields.name: CAM
fields.value: No explicit mention of Common Area Maintenance charges.

fields.name: Real Estate Taxes
fields.value: Tenant responsible for all general taxes, prorated by rent commencement and end dates.

fields.name: Liabilities
items: Payment of rent, taxes, insurance, and other charges.
Maintenance and repair of premises.
Compliance with laws and ordinances.
Indemnification of Lessor for tenant’s activities.
Maintain required insurance and provide certificates.
Repair obligations for removed fixtures/improvements.
Assignment and Subletting with Lessor’s consent.
Holdover provisions – tenant at will with 150% rent if overstaying.

fields.name: Utilities
fields.value: Tenant responsible for all utility charges during lease term.

fields.name: Relocation
fields.value: Tenant may remove buildings and improvements, provided restoration and Lessor consent for transfer to similar banking use.

fields.name: Recapture / Go Dark
fields.value: Not explicitly stated; termination and competitive leasing clauses partially cover similar scenarios.

fields.name: Co-Tenancy
fields.value: Landlord restricted from leasing to competing businesses; tenant may terminate if breach not cured.

fields.name: Radius
fields.value: Tenant restricted from competing within Salina, KS south of Cloud Street; landlord restricted from leasing to interior decor retailers.

fields.name: Estoppel
fields.value: Not explicitly mentioned; insurance certificates serve similar function.
